user_input:
Modify the DHEM model. Use the CRUD pipeline for all except task 2
   o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level (use crud pipeline)
   o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
   o Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
   o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
   o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step. Use the crud pipeline
   o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the most appropriate attribute from the available options.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas and setting all non-zero values to 999 using the clone pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate file for modification from the available options.

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class for the Gas Pipeline category (named to reflect 'PCIPMI capacities Unlimited') and add the filename property with the name of the newly created datafile using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate object and property options from the available choices.

tasks.description: Add a scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, determine the appropriate scenario entity from the available options.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the Gas Pipeline class with the datafile and scenario created previously using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate properties from the available options.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and name the cloned model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate model and scenario entities from the available options.
